name: Adventurous (MasterGamerLOL)
description:
Adventurous: A Platformer Game That Sends the User to Pain.

Adventurous is a game that tests your mental strength.

If you rage quickly -> This game probably won't be for you

If you rage not very often -> Well?  Test yourself.

Adventurous sets places in closed spaces with you controlling a person with all-black clothes.  No one knows his story, people say that he is finding the missing treasure.
